horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: This week is set to be very productive. Your ongoing efforts to make new connections are expected to continue. You may find yourself joining new organizations and could gain support from people in higher positions. Your social network is likely to expand, bringing you increased notice in online and in-person events. The alignment of key planets in your eleventh house indicates that opportunities may also arise through your friends.

The full moon will rise in the fifth house, and this shows completions and endings. You will complete a cycle of events connected to creativity, or you will complete a project which you were working for a long time. There will be some important updates about the children, and it can be about their academic or non-academic activity. For those who are dating, this full moon will bring the time to take the relationship into an official level or you may take a plan to discontinue the relationship. This is also the time to enrol in a course, attend social gatherings, and there will be more desire for fun and entertainment.

Mercury will move into its debilitation sign Pisces during this week, and it will be there for more than thirty days. This is a bit complex time, as the twelfth house indicates isolation and detachment, so you will feel like being alone, and there will be a strong tendency to think about the past. You will have a spiritual inclination, so you will be attending online or offline spiritual functions too. The dreams will be highly symbolic, and they will carry the messages about the future.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: Your career is fully highlighted these days, as the Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are moving through the air sign of Aquarius, so you will have to take up more work. This is a very promising transit for job seekers, so they should work hard, and update their skills to get a new job. There are chances for promotions, role change, and you may even get a new team to work with. You will be highly ambitious and those who were looking for promotions, will get such opportunities too. Those who work in sports, admin and creative sector will get new projects.

The full moon will rise in the fire sign of Leo, so your home and family will have some important events like guests coming up or you purchasing something for home. Domestic matters will come to the forefront, and you will have to take up more responsibilities than earlier. The family discussions regarding ancestral property or any other deal will reach the culmination as the full moon indicates that. The elderly people at home will need more care, and you will have given them sufficient support. This full moon will aspect the tenth house of career, so naturally you will have more workload too.

Mercury will move into its debilitation sign Pisces, that means you will have to be careful with your friendships and network circles. Since Mercury is debilitated, it can bring some confusion in the team work, so you need to be very careful with what you speak with everyone around. If there is a doubt in the team work, then you should clarify that from authoritative sources. There will be some discussions regarding finances, bonuses and incentives, and this is also the time to get some payouts too. Some of the friends may leave you, and there will be opportunities to join a new team as well.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content:
The first week of this month will start with a powerfully full moon in Leo, which will bring culmination in a discussion, which was pending for a while. It can be about a family situation, a project from communication-based domain, or an issue of a sibling. There will be a short trip, a commute issue, or a travel plan, and you were planning it for a long time. People will notice your communication, so please make sure you are using the right words. Those who work in communication-based projects like teaching, preaching and counseling will complete such work too. This full moon will bring some health concerns related to neck or shoulder area as well
The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will bring foreign collaborations, as they are moving through the ninth house. Your attention will shift towards higher education, certifications and training programs, or you will learn a new skill with a long-term perspective. The ninth house indicates gurus, mentors, and fatherly figures, so there will be a close conversation with them, and they will give some advice, which you may not always like. There will be foreign collaborations, and it can come up through visiting a distant location or interacting with an international community. Spiritual matters also will be prominent and you will take interest in pilgrimages, spiritual meetings and discussions with religious figures.

Mercury will enter its debilitation sign Pisces during this week, and this is a complex transit, which will impact your career. You have to be very careful with your communications at work, as there are chances for issues due to unclear communication. There are chances for technical glitches, so please make sure your work devices are functioning properly. You may get new job opportunities, but make sure they are from genuine sources. Work pressure will be the signature of this debilitated planet transiting the tenth house, so you have to be careful with your career.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first cosmic event of this week will be a powerful full moon in the second house, as it will rise in the fire sign of Leo. The money matters will come to a culmination, such as receiving and income, settling a bill, or you will find out where you lose your money. This full moon also will bring expenses for family, and your education too, as the second house indicates upskilling. Your conversations will be mostly about how much you earn, your self-worth, and how much money you have. There will be some opportunities to close your bank account or withdrawing a big amount too.

The Sun, Mars, Venus and Mercury will be in the eighth house, and that also shows the importance of better financial dealing. You may feel that your life is emotionally layered as you are forced to face some bitter experience which you normally avoid. You will have to deal issues with joint account, shared resources, or some issues with the in laws as well. There are chances for trust issues, which can make the situation very vulnerable. Sudden financial needs will come up, and you should be prepared for that. This is also a good time to heal your emotional issues, so many of you will choose therapies.

Mercury will move into its debilitation sign Pisces during this week, and it will impact the ninth house. The ninth house indicates submission and obedience, but you will be a bit rebellious during this transit. Please make sure you are a law-abiding citizen, otherwise you will have to face the anger of people in authority. You will be learning new subjects, and this is a very good time to upskill, which will surely benefit you in the long run. This transit will bring opportunities for foreign trips, long distance trance travel, foreign collaboration, writing and publishing opportunities too.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first week of February is very special for you as the full moon will rise in your sign, so your personal life will be active for the next six months. The Moon indicates emotions, so you will be emotionally sensitive, and please avoid taking everything in your life in an emotional perspective. Some of the personal matters including relationships will reach a culmination, so you will take final decision regarding some matters, and it can be a personal or business relationship too. You will try to go for a makeover session, so you will buy new dress or try to have a new hair cut too.

Multiple planets are moving through the seventh house, so your relationships will be of utmost importance. You may find that it’s not worth enough to push yourself to match other’s expectations, so you will try to be yourself, and that may bring the label of you being selfish, but that’s ok, if you are not being unjust to others. Since the Sun, and Mars are there, there will be arguments in the relationships. However, Mercury and Venus also being here will bring social gatherings, opportunities to meet someone special and new business deals too.

Mercury will move into its debilitation sign Pisces during this week, and that will bring some financial issues as well, as Mercury will be in the eighth house. You will have a lot of conversation about your money, joint account, shared resources, and in law’s asset. There will be some arguments here as Mercury is debilitated, but make sure you are communicating the right things. You will have secret communication, and will plan to start a private investment option without the knowledge of your spouse of other family members. Sudden financial needs also will be arising, so you need to be prepared for that.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first cosmic event of February will be the full moon in Leo, which will impact your emotional self, as it will be rising in the twelfth house. You will have a strong need for rest, retreat and withdrawal as the twelfth house indicates isolation and detachment. This is the time for cosmic reset, as the universe understood the need for rest and restoration. You will have a lot of dreams, which will bring signals about your future, and you should note them down. This full moon may bring some expenses, which can also be some medical expenses too. You can also expect updates about foreign collaborations or long trips.

Multiple planets are moving through the sixth house, so you will naturally focus on your liabilities from work, finances, and health. Your daily life will be busier, so there will be a lot of workloads, and interactions with colleagues. The Sun and Mars are in the sixth house, so please make sure your communications are proper, otherwise there will be arguments with your colleagues. If you were ignoring some of the corrections at work, they can resurface, and you will have to work on it. Your health also needs proper care, especially the lower abdomen will be sensitive.

Mercury will move into its debilitation sign Pisces during this week, and it will bring some issues in the relationship. Mercury indicates communications, so you will have a lot of meetings or one to one communication with your partners from personal and business sector. Small difference of opinions can turn into arguments, due to lack of focus, so make sure you are very attentive in these meetings. There will be some social gatherings, but please keep a hand’s distance from everyone, otherwise you may speak out something, which can work against yourself. You may have to sign some contracts, but make sure you read the terms and conditions carefully.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first cosmic event of February will be the full moon in Leo, which will trigger your eleventh house of long-term plans and projects. Since the full moon indicates culmination and endings, some of the team work will end during this full moon phase. You will be more aware of your ambitions, and desires and you will easily identify what can bring you the better results. The friendships may turn bitter, and there are chances for some of the friends leaving you, or you leave some of them. You will get some pending dues, so financial benefits are also seen through this transit.

Multiple planets are moving through the fifth house so your creative energies will be high and people will notice that. You will attend some social gatherings where you display your creative skills, and that will be highly beneficial for you in a long term. You will have more interaction with your siblings, friends, children and a younger community, but you will need more patience to deal with them. Please avoid risk taking tendencies, otherwise that will bring some financial losses. You will also find someone special, so single Librans will have the closest opportunity to fall in love.

Mercury will move into its debilitation point Pisces, which will impact your sixth house of work, colleagues and health. This is not so good transit, so make sure you are very punctual at work, as there will be some concerns developing related with your work or colleagues. Please avoid any kind of unhealthy talk with your colleagues, otherwise there will be long lasting troubles. Job seekers may get a new offer, but make sure these offers are coming from the genuine source. Your health is also important, and the lower abdomen will be sensitive, so have a good diet.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first week of February will witness a powerful full moon in Leo, which rules your tenth house, so you will have some important events taking place at work, and they may be majorly endings. This can be the time for review, feedback or appraisal, or you getting results for some completed projects. There will be more visibility for you like promotions, or acknowledgement, but make sure they are for the right reasons. There will be more interactions with managers, superiors or authority figures, but chances for arguments also exist. This is a sensitive transit, which can work for and against you, so you should plan carefully.

Multiple planets are moving through the fourth house, so your family matters also will be of utmost importance. Home and family will become central focus, so you have to take more responsibilities and also take final decisions regarding a family matter. Your domestic environment will be very busy, as there are chances for real estate deals, renovation or family meetings. Elders and youngsters will have more needs and you should address them during this phase. Some of your family members may move out of station or someone will come back home. You will have costly purchases as well.

Mercury will move into its debilitation point Pisces during this week, and that will impact the fifth house of creativity. This is a very tricky transit, as you will get chances to invest, but please avoid risky investments, otherwise you may face losses. Please make sure your business is a workable idea, and don’t take a final decision when Mercury is in Pisces, as it will also go retrograde from the last week onwards. You will have a lot of communication with peers, children and youngsters, but make sure this communication are clear. Love life also can go through some turbulence due to lack of clarity.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The full moon will rise in your ninth house during this week, and this is a big cosmic event which can have long lasting impact on your studies, foreign collaboration, and faith. Matters related to higher education, courses, certificates or exams will reach a final point during this lunation. If you were trying for a foreign collaboration, or a long-distance travel, it will also get finalized during this time. You will have conversations with teachers, gurus and mentors, and they will give you valuable inputs. Some clashes regarding faith and belief system can come up, so you have to be very careful.

Multiple planets will be impacting the third house, so you will have busy days. There will be more calls, messages, and team events, which can be online and offline, so naturally communications will increase. There will be more interactions with siblings, cousins and family members and you can also expect family meetings. The third house indicates short trips, and there will be such trips, transfers or interdepartmental transfer too. This is also time week to spend in writing, teaching and publishing your work, so you will be productive as well. However, you may have some physical issues in the neck and shoulder area too.

Mercury will move into its debilitation point Pisces, which will impact your fourth house of home and family. You will have work from home options, but there will be some stress regarding work. You will work hard but it will be a bit difficult to bring the results. There will be some renovation work at home, so, you can expect a lot of expenses too. There will be selling and buying of a land or a property, which will also be a very tough task. You can also expect family meetings; spiritual rituals and your elders need more support.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first cosmic event of this month will be the full moon in the eighth house, so you will have a natural focus on financial matters. You will have to be very careful with your financial matters, as the full moon is showing that for the next six months, your financial matters will be very important, and sensitive. You will feel like spending, but you should avoid that, otherwise for the next six months, your financial matters will be beyond your control. This is a very sensitive time for your emotional needs as you will be feeling a bit drained. However, this is a very good time for healing therapies.

The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will be moving through the second house, so again it shows the financial matters will be important. There will be discussions with your family about how you spend and how much should you spend. Your family will interfere in your financial plans, and you may not like it. There will be arguments regarding this interference, and some unpleasant situation can also arise in the family. This is a good time for job seekers, as the second house also indicates career, so there are chances to get new job, part time or freelancing opportunity.

Mercury will move into the debilitation sign Pisces, which will impact the third house, so you will have a lot of communication and physical activities like sports. You will have to be careful with your communication, as debilitated Mercury can bring confusion in the communication. Learning, teaching and training also will be the part of this transit, so this will bring further opportunities too. There will be some arguments with your sibling’s ad neighbors, and there will be lack of clarity in many things, which is a down side of this transit. You can also expect short travels, transfer and interdepartmental transfer too.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The first cosmic event of this month will be the full moon in Leo, which will bring endings or important events in the relationships. There will be problem solving sessions in the ongoing relationship issues, so, this is a good transit as well. This is also a time for reassessment in business partnerships, so you can expect events like renegotiation, or you will think about practical adjustments which need a perfect balance. You will also attend social gatherings, which can project your talents into a larger community. Single Aquarius natives will have the closest opportunity to find someone special. You will also be very sensitive to your partner’s need too.

The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus are moving through the first house, which is the solar return time for you. This is a time to renew yourself, so you will go for an image makeover, or you will buy new dresses or a new hair cut as well. Since malefics are also the part of transit, you will have minor health issues, but they will vanish after this transit. You will also try to get some new contracts, or new job, which will be possible. There will be events like travel, relocation and renovation at home.

Mercury will move into Pisces, which rules your second house, so your financial matters will be very important. Mercury is in a debilitation mode, so you need to be very careful with what you buy as debilitated Mercury indicates financial issues. There will be some expensive buys, which you regret later, so it will be good if you avoid that. However, this is a great time for you to learn new things, and focus on upskilling as you will get opportunities for appraisals, promotions, or even a new job as well. However, Mercury is moving through the second house of speech, so you will have the tendency for unwanted talks, and please avoid that.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting February 1
content: The full moon will rise in Leo and that will impact your sixth house of debts, diseases and enemies. The sixth house indicates workplace, so there will be some workload, and you have to cop up with the pressure. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so if you are a job seeker, there are chances to get a new job in the next six months. Please avoid all kind of unhealthy talks with your colleagues, otherwise there will be some arguments. Your lower abdomen is also sensitive, and there are chances for digestive issues.

Multiple planets are moving through the twelfth house, so this is the time for cosmic reset as the Sun will soon move into your first house. During this week, you will have emotional burdens, and you have to settle them by attending some therapies. The sleep issues also will come up, so you will have to deal with it, and the sleep will be full of complex dreams. These dreams will carry signals about the future, so it will be good if you note them down. There will be some updates from the foreign lands, and you will spend more time in isolation and detachment.

Mercury will move into your sign, but it will be debilitated, so you will have some personal issues to deal with. There will be a lot of communication about personal needs, ideas and opinions, but you may get misunderstood, it will be good if you give your opinion, if someone asks for it. There are chances for short trips, and communication with local community as well. This is not the time to go for public interactions, but this is a good time to analyses yourself and make some long-term plans. Don’t worry as this is a temporary phase, and your good times will start soon.
